spec_data.Name: perl-VM-EC2-Security-CredentialCache
spec_data.Description:
This Perl package provides a cache for an EC2's IAM credentials. Rather than
retrieving the credentials for every possible call that uses them, cache them
until they expire and retrieve them again if they have expired.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:11:21 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Cache credentials respecting expiration time for IAM roles
